sections.title: Student of War (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Student of War class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Additional Skill (Student of War)
sections.description: The student of war gains a new class skill of her choice at 1st level and every 2 levels thereafter.

sections.title: Know Your Enemy (Ex) (Student of War)
sections.description: As a move action, the student makes a Knowledge check to study a foe and gain insight bonuses through defensive, martial, or tactical stances.

sections.title: Combat Feat (Student of War)
sections.description: The student of war gains bonus combat feats at 2nd, 5th, and 8th levels.

sections.title: Mind Over Metal (Ex) (Student of War)
sections.description: The student can use Intelligence modifier instead of Dexterity modifier for Armor Class when wearing armor or using a shield, still limited by maximum Dexterity bonus.

sections.title: Anticipate (Ex) (Student of War)
sections.description: As an immediate action, the student can completely ignore damage and effects from spells or abilities she successfully saved against, usable once per day plus additional uses every 3 levels.

sections.title: Telling Blow (Ex) (Student of War)
sections.description: Against studied foes, the student ignores up to 5 points of typed damage reduction and stacks with Penetrating Strike feat.

sections.title: Nemesis (Su) (Student of War)
sections.description: As a swift action once per day, the student grants her weapon the bane special ability against her studied foe for 1 minute.

sections.title: Deadly Blow (Su) (Student of War)
sections.description: When exceeding Knowledge check DC by 10 or more with know your enemy, the student ignores the target's natural damage reduction and immunities to critical hits and sneak attacks.
